summary: A successful artist, married to a famous composer, must suddenly deal with a number of crises, from the death of the family dog to the illness of her father and absence of her husband.
cast: Julia Jentsch|Peter Gantzler|Maciej Stuhr|Andrzej Hudziak|Malgorzata Hajewska|Izabela Kuna|Rafal Mackowiak|Renata Dancewicz|Roman Gancarczyk|Andrzej Kuchno|Maria Mamona|Maria Maj|Ewa Worytkiewicz|Boguslawa Schubert|Wojciech Michniewski|Krzysztof Koncewicz|Slawomir Zapala|Dominika Ostalowska|Robert Wieckiewicz|Ben Talar
title: 33 sceny z zycia
